summary: A simple mod to make the crosshair a simple dot.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tyhju.png[/img][/center]

A simple remake of IceKK\'s wonderful [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15213]Small Crosshair[/url] mod, made to work with mounted combat. This works great with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222]iHUD[/url] by Gopher.

NOTE: This mod is NOT compatible with any mod that alters or changes hudmenu.gfx or hudmenu.swf in any way.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Yq4RX.png[/img]
Extract \"hudmenu.swf\" to the Data\\Interface folder in your Skyrim directory.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/yoCet.png[/img]
Remove \"hudmenu.swf\" from the Data\\Interface folder in your Skyrim directory.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ntZIq.png[/img]
With the Oblivion style sneak eye, there is a crosshair forced to where the sneak eye would usually work as a crosshair. As a workaround, there is a version without this crosshair available. Sometime in the future I would like to add a configuration file to the mod so that this isn\'t necessary.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qHR4Y.png[/img]
Version 1.20
	Dropped support for \"normal\" versions (still available under Old versions)
	Added new \"Oblivion style\" version
Version 1.11
	Fixed font issues
Version 1.10
	Added new All Simple version
	Improved No Sneak Eye version
Version 1.01
	Fixed dragon script
Version 1.0
	Initial Upload

[img]http://i.imgur.com/WWCUt.png[/img]
SkyUI Team for their decompiled UI sources
IceKK for the original idea (Note: This does not use IceKK\'s files in any way.)
author: Shadow771
